overview:
Jan Schwarz is president of Ajax13 Inc. and CompareSoft Inc. In these roles, he manages both Ajax13 Inc. and CompareSoft’s day-to-day business operations and oversees product development, sales, support and business strategy.

Previously, Schwarz was president and chief executive officer of Market Simple Inc., which provided publishing and franchise related services to San Diego based newspaper publications.

He spent eight years at IBM Corporation working in development, application testing, business strategy and sales. Most recently, he was a sales manager for IBM’s Small Business unit, a Western U.S. organization focused on building new business relationships and growing revenue at some of IBM’s most important software industry customers.

Schwarz holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Western Ontario. In 2001, he received an award for top achievement from IBM’s Global Sales School, Atlanta.
